name: z-wave-js-ui
description: Z-Wave JS UI is a self-hosted control and management UI for Z-Wave networks using Z-Wave JS. It provides node inclusion, configuration, and diagnostics with dashboards and charts.
features: Node management: Add, remove, and configure Z-Wave devices through an intuitive web interface without command-line tools.
Network visualization: View your Z-Wave mesh network topology with signal strength and routing information.
Device configuration: Modify device parameters and settings with detailed descriptions and validation.
Firmware updates: Update device firmware over-the-air when manufacturers release new versions with bug fixes or features.
Scene control: Create and trigger scenes that control multiple devices simultaneously for automation scenarios.
Association management: Configure device associations for direct communication without controller involvement.
Diagnostic tools: Troubleshoot network issues with ping tests, route analysis, and communication statistics.
MQTT gateway: Expose Z-Wave devices to MQTT for integration with Home Assistant, Node-RED, and other platforms.
Value monitoring: Track device values and states in real-time with historical graphs and logging.
Backup and restore: Export complete network configuration including device settings for disaster recovery.
Security support: Manage S0 and S2 security for encrypted communication with compatible devices.
Healing tools: Optimize network performance by rebuilding routes and updating neighbor information automatically.
